com.googlecode.aluminumproject.templates

Class DefaultActionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.templates.DefaultActionContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionContext

    public class DefaultActionContext
extends Object
implements ActionContext
    The action context implementation that is used by the default action element.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultActionContext(Configuration configuration, ActionDescriptor actionDescriptor, ActionFactory actionFactory, Context context, Writer writer)
      Creates a default action context.

        configuration - the current configuration
        actionDescriptor - the descriptor of the action
        actionFactory - the action factory that will create the action
        context - the context that the action will use
        writer - the writer that the writer will use

      • addInterceptor

        public void addInterceptor(ActionInterceptor interceptor)
                    throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: ActionContext
        Adds an interceptor to this action context. The later an action interceptor is added, the higher its priority.
        Specified by:
        addInterceptor in interface ActionContext
        Parameters:
        interceptor - the interceptor to add
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the interceptor has no chance of running

      • proceed

        public void proceed()
             throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: ActionContext
        Proceeds this action context by running the next interceptor of the current phase. If there are no more interceptors to run, this method does nothing.
        Specified by:
        proceed in interface ActionContext
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the interceptor can't be run
